text: Steven Owusu Kaakyire is a Ghanaian professional footballer who is last known to have played for Ngezi Platinum Stars of the Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League in 2018. == Career == Owusu Kaakyire began his career by Super Vikins FC later moved in July 2012 to Ebusua Dwarfs. He played for Berekum Chelsea in the Ghana Premier League in the 2015–16 season. ===Move to Zimbabwe=== Zimbabwe was Owusu's next destination, where he joined Ngezi Platinum Stars on March 3, 2018, for their 2018–19 Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League season. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Berekum Chelsea |2016 Ghanaian Premier League |Ghanaian Premier League |21||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||21||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !21!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!21!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== * * Football 365 profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Ghana Premier League players Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Berekum Chelsea F.C. players Category:Ngezi Platinum F.C. players
